LogueEffectInfo.Name: Thumb Training Certificate
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: All Librarians can use Ranged Combat Pages
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“Proof that you can handle firearms, at least ineffectively.”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Bad Manners!
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: You're unable to visit shops this act

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Rare Street Thug Action Figure
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [Consumable] Upon use gain {0} Ahn. Value grows by 3 for every battle won
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“I have nothing but my— holy shit is that Roland the Street Thug™!?”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Slow Burn
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Burn stacks reduce by 1/3 instead of 1/4

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Enkephalin Sticker
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: All Librarians start at Emotional Level 1
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“Love, heart, control Enkephalin! It gets you going.”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Desc: All future cards will appear as upgraded versions of themselves

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Suppressive Fire
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Ranged Offensive Die gain +1 Power against enemies targeted by other Librarian’s Ranged Combat Pages
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“Enemies in that direction! Copy. Erasing that direction.”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Scrap Shield
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Adds 1 Counter Die (Block, 2-5) to the selected Librarian’s queue. Min. and Max. value increases by 1 per chapter
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“Sticks and stones may just break your bones.”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: HP Bullet
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [Consumable] Selected Librarian recovers 30% HP

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Aggro Stim
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [Consumable] Selected Librarian gains 2 Strength this Scene
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“To become Her greatest soldier one must also be Her greatest eeper.”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: RFLX Stim
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [Consumable] Selected Librarian gains 2 Endurance this Scene

LogueEffectInfo.Name: W1-ND
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [Consumable] Selected Librarian gains 3 Haste this Scene

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 1R0N Stim
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [Consumable] Selected Librarian gains 3 Protection and Stagger Protection this Scene

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Crowbar
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Attacks deal +50% damage and stagger damage to targets above 90% HP

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Bloodshed
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: All characters deal double damage and stagger damage this Scene Can be used once per battle.
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“The man in the mirror nods his head…”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Grade-1 Steroids
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [Consumable] Selected Librarian's dice have their max value increased by 2 and min value lowered by 1 for two Scenes.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Caffeine Pills
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [Consumable] Selected Librarian's dice have their min value increased by 2 and max value lowered by 1 for two Scenes.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Light Fragment
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [Consumable] The selected fallen Librarian is revived with half of their max HP
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“For a single moment you are embraced by endless self fulfillment.”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Future
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Whenever you gain a Combat Page, upgrade it.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Big Brother's Chains
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: When using a Combat Page, all dice on that page gain Power equal to the amount of copies of the Combat Page in hand.
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“Etched within one of the chains, one can barely read 'Big Rich'”</color>
